articles.title: Oldest Planetary Debris Found In Milky Way: Study - NDTV
articles.description: Two peculiar white dwarfs seen by the European Space Agency's GAIA space observatory were modelled for this study.
articles.content:
The scientists made WDJ2147-4035 the oldest metal-polluted white dwarf (Picture credit: ANI)
Astronomers led by the University of Warwick have found the oldest star in the Milky way galaxy. The olde… [+3796 chars]

articles.title: Protecting Journalists Is Protecting Freedom Of Expression For All - Forbes
articles.description: In October 2022, the European Parliament published its commissioned study concerning safety of journalists and media freedom globally which found the progressive erosion of media freedom around the world.
